subject: junit beginner
msgSnippet: Hi Can anyone help me I am trying to use junit although I am having problems with starting it off, I have junit3.8.1 in one folder and my java in another. I
messageBody:
Hi

Can anyone help me I am trying to use junit although I
am having problems with starting it off, I have
junit3.8.1 in one folder and my java in another. I
have a separate folder called TestStuff where I have
two batch files called compile and run.

In my compile.bat
c:\j2sdk1.4.0\bin\javac -classpath
c:\junit3.8.1\junit.jar MoneyTest.java

In my run.bat
set CLASSPATH=.;c:\junit3.8.1\junit.jar
c:\j2sdk1.4.0\bin\java junit.swingui.TestRunner
MoneyTest

If I run this the junit interface tells me to load a
TestCase, this is the first time that I have used
JUnit and I'm hoping that one of you can help me.

Thanks
Franco
